meanings.definition: The state of being certain or confident.
meanings.sent1: Her certitudes about the upcoming test helped her stay calm.
meanings.sent2: His certitudes about the safety of the neighborhood were reassuring.
meanings.sent3: Despite his certitudes, he still double-checked the locks on the door.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, certitudes can sometimes be elusive.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's certitudes in her abilities inspired her students to excel.

meanings.definition: Something that is certain or sure.
meanings.sent1: The scientist presented his certitudes during the conference.
meanings.sent2: The certitudes of the outcome made her decision easier.
meanings.sent3: The cat's certitudes about getting treats were always amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The certitudes of nature's beauty never fail to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The certitudes of friendship bring warmth to our hearts.
